text: Ɓaɓilɔne ɠima nuiti ti masagi wooɠaaʋoteni Alamea wooi zu,2:4 Alamea wooi zu: Alamea wooi ɠɛni ga zii wooi naa nii ɛsɛ pɛ ge ɠɛni mɛnisu Ɓaɓilɔne yooi zu ná pɛ, kona undɔsaʋa (800), aisa Yesu ʋa zɔlɔɔ. ti ɠɛ ma: «È-zii zuɠooza, Masagi! Segi wo gi ma, gɛi gi ga ɗa-wotiɠɛ nuiti, naazu gá poluʋɛ lɛ ga ɗe.»
